## Boxplot of Stardates
```{r}
  stapi("episode", page_count = TRUE) # check first
# stapi("episode", page = 2) %>% select(1:2)
 stapi("episode")
 ep<- stapi("episode")
 ep_trim <- ep %>%  select(series.title, stardateFrom, stardateTo) %>% drop_na
  
p <- plot_ly(ep_trim, y = ~stardateFrom, color = ~series.title, type = "box")
p %>%
  layout(
    yaxis = list(
      showexponent = "all",
      separatethousands = FALSE, #doesn't seem to be working
      exponentformat = "none"
    )
  )
```
